field.label: CARP Aware
field.help: Only run DNS updates on the CARP master node. When enabled, the backup node will skip all DNS operations. Standalone systems without CARP interfaces are not affected (fail-open).

field.label: CARP VIP
field.help: Select a CARP VIP to monitor, or "Any" to monitor all CARP interfaces. If any monitored VIP is BACKUP, DNS updates are skipped.
